results.title: Acute biventricular failure as a sequela of multiple autoimmune disorders.
results.text_hl: Concomitant diagnosis of progressive mixed @<m>DISEASE_Connective_Tissue_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003240 @@@connective tissue disease@@@ associated with severe @DISEASE_Hypothyroidism @DISEASE_MESH:D007037 @@@hypothyroidism@@@ was made.
